edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller

Class QuoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller.QuoteController

  • @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Quote.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/quotes")
public class QuoteController
extends Object
    Defines REST endpoints for servicing requests on Quote resources, invoking QuoteRepository methods to perform the required operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuoteController(QuoteRepository quoteRepository, SourceRepository sourceRepository, RandomReplacementStage<Quote> stage)
      Initializes this instance, injecting an instance of QuoteRepository and an instance of SourceRepository.

      Deletes the specified Quote resource from the database.

      Adds the provided Quote resource to the database and returns the completed resource, including timestamp & ID.

      Replaces the text (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Quote resource with the text from the provided resource.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuoteController

        @Autowired
public QuoteController(QuoteRepository quoteRepository,
                                   SourceRepository sourceRepository,
                                   RandomReplacementStage<Quote> stage)
        Initializes this instance, injecting an instance of QuoteRepository and an instance of SourceRepository.
        Parameters:
        quoteRepository - repository used for operations on Quote entity instances.
        sourceRepository - repository used for operations on Source entity instances.
        stage - container used to select the quote of the day at random from a stream.

    • Method Detail

      • random

        @GetMapping(value="random",
            produces="application/json")
public Quote random()
        Returns a randomly selected Quote resource. Unlike qod(), this method will usually not give the same result on successive invocations, unless the number of quotes in the database is small.
        Returns:
        random Quote.

      • qod

        @GetMapping(value="qod",
            produces="application/json")
public Quote qod()
        Returns a randomly selected Quote resource, presumably for use in "Quote of the Day"-type applications. The most recent selection is retained until that quote is removed, or until the next day (according to the server), so while the quote returned will generally not be the same from one day to the next, invocations during the same day will generally return the same quote.
        Returns:
        random Quote, regenerated daily.

      • search

        @GetMapping(value="search",
            produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Quote> search(@RequestParam(value="q")
                                                                                                     String fragment)
        Returns a sequence of Quote resources, containing the specified text.
        Parameters:
        fragment - text to match (case-insensitive).
        Returns:
        sequence of Quote resources.

      • list

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Quote> list()
        Returns a sequence of all the Quote resources in the database.
        Returns:
        sequence of Quote resources.

      • post

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Quote> post(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                 Quote quote)
        Adds the provided Quote resource to the database and returns the completed resource, including timestamp & ID. The provided resource is only required to contain a text property, with a non-null value.
        Parameters:
        quote - partial Quote resource.
        Returns:
        completed Quote resource.

      • get

        @GetMapping(value="{quoteId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Quote get(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                           UUID quoteId)
        Retrieves and returns the Quote resource with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - quote UUID.
        Returns:
        retrieved Quote resource.

      • put

        @PutMapping(value="{quoteId}",
            consumes="application/json")
public Quote put(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                           UUID quoteId,
                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                           Quote update)
        Replaces the text (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Quote resource with the text from the provided resource.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - source UUID.
        update - Quote resource to use to replace contents of existing quote.
        Returns:
        complete Quote resource, including new text.

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="{quoteId}")
 @ResponseStatus(value=NO_CONTENT)
public void delete(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                          UUID quoteId)
        Deletes the specified Quote resource from the database.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - quote UUID.

      • attach

        @PutMapping(value="{quoteId}/sources/{sourceId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Source attach(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                                                  UUID quoteId,
                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                  UUID sourceId)
        Associates the Source referenced in the path with the Quote, also referenced by a path parameter.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - UUID of Quote resource.
        sourceId - UUID of Source to be associated with referenced Quote.
        Returns:
        updated Source resource.

      • get

        @GetMapping(value="{quoteId}/sources/{sourceId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Source get(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                                               UUID quoteId,
                                                                                                               @PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                               UUID sourceId)
        Retrieves and returns the referenced Source resource associated with the referenced Quote resource. If either does not exist, or if the referenced source is not associated with the quote, this method will fail.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - UUID of Quote resource.
        sourceId - UUID of Source associated with referenced Quote.
        Returns:
        referenced Source resource.

      • detach

        @DeleteMapping(value="{quoteId}/sources/{sourceId}")
 @ResponseStatus(value=NO_CONTENT)
public void detach(@PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                                             UUID quoteId,
                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                             UUID sourceId)
        Removes the association between the referenced Quote resource and the referenced Source resource. If either does not exist, or if the referenced source is not associated with the quote, this method will fail.
        Parameters:
        quoteId - UUID of Quote resource.
        sourceId - UUID of Source to be disassociated from referenced Quote.

      • notFound

        @ResponseStatus(value=NOT_FOUND,
                reason="Resource not found")
 @ExceptionHandler(value=java.util.NoSuchElementException.class)
public void notFound()
        Maps (via annotation) a NoSuchElementException to a response status code of HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.

      • badRequest

        @ResponseStatus(value=BAD_REQUEST,
                reason="Invalid quote")
 @ExceptionHandler(value={org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException.class,javax.persistence.RollbackException.class})
public void badRequest()
        Maps (via annotation) ConstraintViolationException and RollbackException to a response status code of HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.
